Jobs.title: Executive  Assistant
Jobs.description: ', '    PA to the main executive of the company & Executive Assistant to the board of directors. Organization of their schedules, follow-up, phone calls, meetings, archive and files, etc..', '

summary: ', '    Almost 15 years as secretary of multinational companies assisting CEOs and presidents from Brazil and other countries. Have pro-active, flexible and organized attitude. Always try to assist my superiors in a way to facilitate ther routines and unexpected activities. During my experience, had the chance to improve business skills and conflicts managing and also developed the capacity of working under pressure. Valorize high ethics models and a healthy working environment.', '
